name: Bob-L
description:
GAMEPLAY
Avoid deadly obstacles as you traverse your way through in order to find the exit from this mysterious facility you were spawned in. Propel yourself using yourself to shoot bubbles!

CONTROLS

Left click to fire a piece of yourself away, the longer you hold the greater the size of the piece.

Right clicking cancels the charge.

When you can't fire away anymore you will launch yourself as a last ditch effort in the direction of the red circular highlight.

The mouse wheel zooms in and out.

CREDITS

Minde / Code / 3D Models / Rendering
Charley / Sound / 3D Models
Nick / Code / Sound / Level Design
